issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Benchmark crate does not have a SIMD feature
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10884](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10884). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The benchmarks run without SIMD by default. We need to add a feature to the Cargo.toml to enable SIMD.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10884?focusedCommentId=17332318) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-datafusion/issues/124
